ELECTRONIC 
SCREENS
Methanol is used 
to make a chemical 
derivative used in  
LCD screens for cars, 
TVs, watches, phones 
and computers.VEHICLE FUEL
A cleaner burning fuel 
than diesel and gasoline, 
methanol is used to fuel 
cars, buses and trucks.
Methanol is also used  
to produce fuel additives 
(MTBE) to help reduce 
tail-pipe emissions and  
in the production of  
bio-diesel which is a 
diesel substitute.CAR PARTS
Methanol is used in 
plastics to make car 
parts like plastic body 
panels, dashboard 
foam, plastic gears 
and mouldings, 
helping make cars 
lighter and more  
fuel efficient.
Methanol can support efforts to make 
transportation more sustainable by 
making lighter components for vehicles  
or for use directly as a cleaner burning  
fuel or indirectly as a fuel additive.Methanol is Essential 
for Everyday Life
31,000
By the end of 2022, approximately 
27,000 M100 taxis (running on 
100 per cent methanol), 3,000 heavy 
duty trucks and 1,000 methanol hybrid 
passenger cars were operating in China.
